title: Isaiah Thomas (politician)
added: In October 2020, Thomas introduced a bill intended to decrease racial profiling by police during traffic stops. The bill would require more than a minor traffic violation for police to pull over a vehicle.<ref>{{Cite web|title=Philly City Council bill would ban police traffic stops for minor violations|url=https://whyy.org/articles/philly-city-council-bill-would-ban-police-traffic-stops-for-minor-violations/|access-date=2021-02-14|website=WHYY|language=en-US}}</ref>
